item.title: Exploiting IDOR Vulnerability in PostgREST
item.description:
Exploiting IDOR Vulnerability in PostgREST

This time, I was exploring the web3 space again, on a platform where you can earn points by completing campaigns they provide. On this platform, when you complete their campaigns, you’re given coins that can potentially be converted into crypto tokens later.
